name: mmeester/plugin-dev-tools
description: This plugin makes hot proxy available for manual local installations with tools like MAMP, valet+ and others that don't support port 80

label.de-DE: Dieses Plugin stellt Hot Proxy für manuelle lokale Installationen mit Tools wie MAMP, Valet + und anderen zur Verfügung, die Port 80 nicht unterstützen
label.en-GB: This plugin makes hot proxy available for manual local installations with tools like MAMP, valet+ and others that don't support port 80
